subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Robinson Cano went 4 for 6 with a home run, two doubles and five runs batted in to support Andy Pettitte’s strong pitching in a blowout victory over the Indians.
snippet: Robinson Cano went 4 for 6 with a home run, two doubles and five runs batted in to support Andy Pettitte’s strong pitching in a blowout victory over the Indians.
